---
title: "Exercise 1"
description: |
  Take the data from VAST challenge, used the data collected from volunteers to evaluate the city's demographics.

---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r,include=FALSE}
df<-read.csv('./data/Participants.csv')
head(df)
```


## Demographics

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data=df)+aes(householdSize)+geom_bar()
ggplot(data=df)+aes(haveKids)+geom_bar()
ggplot(data=df,aes(x=age,fill=haveKids))+geom_histogram(binwidth = 5)
ggplot(data=df)+aes(educationLevel,fill=haveKids)+geom_bar()
ggplot(data=df)+aes(interestGroup)+geom_bar()
ggplot(data=df)+aes(joviality)+geom_density()
ggplot(data=df,aes(x=joviality,colour=haveKids))+geom_density()
ggplot(data=df,aes(x=joviality,colour=interestGroup))+geom_density()
```
